ComicInfo.Summary: The equinox ceremony is on once again. A mother, a maiden, and a crone—in the loosest sense—have come together again to redistribute the Magick that hangs above the city. With Lily’s young son in peril, Celia has agreed to use the sacred ritual to do the unthinkable: allow Peacekeeper to burn herself alive with all the world’s Magick inside of her. The life of a witch seems destined to end in fire.
